department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Furnishing of all labour, materials, tools, equipment, supervision required to perform the maintenance inspections, calibrations, certification and repairs to the various types of safety equipment.
description: The Contract is for the furnishing of all labour, materials, tools, equipment, supervision required to perform the maintenance inspections, calibrations, certi?cation and repairs to the various types of safety equipment in accordance with this speci?cation, as described in the Statement of Work. All inquiries of a technical nature and all questions of a contractual nature are to be submitted to the Contracting Authority:
full_summary:
### Safety Equipment Certifications Tender

#### Government Tender Announcement

**Reference Number:** WS4532839353-Doc4532925926
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** WS4532839353
**Publication Date:** 2024-04-12
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-07-04T14:00:00 (Expired)
**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-05-21

The government department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting proposals from bidders to provide safety equipment certifications for the Department of National Defence (DND).

**Tender Details:**

* **Procurement Category:** Service (SRV)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Valid Trade Agreements:** The following trade agreements are applicable:
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

**Deliveries:**

* **Regions of Delivery:** Nova Scotia and Halifax

**Evaluation and Awarding:**

The proposal with the lowest price will be the successful bidder.

**Contracting Entity:**

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:**
	+ 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
	+ Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5 Canada

**Contact Information:**

* **Name:** Leonard, Dylon (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** dylon.leonard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19387926?extsite=MTkzODc5MjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1
